vuepress-theme-easy-book

@v1.2.x Look here

Rapidly build knowledge base websites only using Markdown.

The vuepress-theme-easy-book lets you efficiently create personal knowledge base websites or comprehensive documentation platforms without using any codes, which enables you to concentrate on the notes and knowledge itself.
Get Started

Features

With multiple features,you can customize the look and feel without complex coding and create professional sites effortlessly.
